posts.post_title: SOLD: 1899-00 M101-1 Sporting News - Jimmy Collins HOF (BGS 1)
posts.post_content:
Good Evening, Collectors:

Up for sale tonight is an extremely rare 1899-00 M101-1 Sporting News Supplements - Jimmy Collins HOF which has been very conservatively graded a BGS 1 by the strict graders at Beckett Grading Services, the industry leader in third-party grading. Please review scans of the front and back for condition details. Sale price on this beauty is $SOLD dlvd. and the first person to e-mail me and state "I'll take it" is the new owner. My e-mail address is: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url]
